Detailed Description

The Interface class to all taglibactions.

All actions that use taglib, are handled over this interfaceclass There is no way to set single tag informations. Reading and setting tags is done only over a complete Taginformation

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const int  type 
)

Constructor.

Takes over the filename, and initializes the tags, to a zerovalue QString that takes the filename int containing the filetype to open

bool taglibinterface::save ( const taginformation &  tag,
const int  filetype,
const int  version = tagversion::v1tag|tagversion::v2tag 
)

Saves a tag.

Saves the given taginformation into the filename that was given in constructor.
As default it saves both id3v1- and id3v2-tags, when no version is given. tag Contains all informations that should be saved. filetype Tell taglibinterface what filetype the object is version Contains the tagversion the file will be saved if it is mp3(use tagversion::tagtype to set filetype)
